title: About Us
intro: Future Import & Export was established in 2001, bringing over 20 years of experience in international trade and local distribution.
activity: The company began by importing and exporting computer accessories, then expanded by opening its first retail outlet in El-Bostan Mall, Downtown Cairo, followed by a second branch in Morgane Street, Attaba.
manufacturing: In 2012, Future expanded into local manufacturing by launching a specialized factory for concrete spacer production in 15th of May City.
brands: The company owns several registered brands, including: Vesta Future, Enjoy Future
brands-dis: The company is an authorized distributor of several international brands, including:
exclusive: Future is also the exclusive distributor of the global brand NB in Egypt, a leading name in monitor stands.
mission: Our mission is to consistently deliver high-quality products and exceptional service while continuing to grow and expand.
